text: @Peston You CANNOT get herd immunity nor vaccine for viruses that mutate rapidly.  Not now, not ever. Like the HIV, for example. Bejin already has a mutated strand of Covid19. Less than a year after the first infections. What vaccine are you dreaming about? Think about it!
